Description: This apartment is a 2nd Floor 5 room 2 Bed 1 Bath with washer dryer hookups in the pantry. The 2 bedrooms are good size with good closet space. The living room and dining room have great light. The unit includes a front and back porch both being refinished dedicated to the apartment and a shared yard space. Parking is on the street no permit required, no pets, and no smoking. The unit is heated with gas steam radiators.
